Description: Mohammad Al Mojil Group Co (known as: MMG) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2008. MMG operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Construction and Engineering. It has 3 subsidiaries operating across UAE and Saudi Arabia, working on Construction and Engineering and Human Resource and Employment Services. MMG is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1954.
